articles.description: Nathan Lyon was the one Australia cricketer who seemingly never gets hurt. However, he was injured in the first innings.
articles.content:
LONDON (AP) Nathan Lyon was the one Australia cricketer who seemingly never gets hurt.
On the landmark occasion of his 100th consecutive test, a testament to durability, he was hurt.
